text: Simone Genevois (1912–1995) was a French film actress.Warner p.324 She began her career as a child actor. Her best-known role was in the 1929 epic Saint Joan the Maid in which she played the title part of Joan of Arc. ==Selected filmography== * Simone (1918) * The House of Mystery (1923) * André Cornélis (1927) * Saint Joan the Maid (1929) == References == == Bibliography == * Marina Warner. Joan of Arc: The Image of Female Heroism. OUP, 2013. == External links == * Category:1912 births Category:1995 deaths Category:French film actresses Category:French silent film actresses Category:20th-century French actresses Category:French child actresses Category:Actresses from Paris
title: Simone Genevois
